Failed to install eslint with react-native project
I react-native project want use eslint style check . But I got error run command : ESLint could n't find plugin & quot ; eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y & quot ; . This happen couple different reason : If ESLint installed globally , make sure eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y also installed globally . A globally-installed ESLint find locally-installed plugin . If ESLint installed locally , 's likely plugin n't installed correctly . Try reinstalling running following : npm eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y @ latest -- save-dev If still ca n't figure problem , please stop http : //gitter.im/eslint/eslint chat team . package.json file : & quot ; dependency & quot ; : { & quot ; react & quot ; : & quot ; 15.4.2 & quot ; , & quot ; react-native & quot ; : & quot ; 0.40.0 & quot ; , & quot ; react-redux & quot ; : & quot ; ^5.0.2 & quot ; , & quot ; redux & quot ; : & quot ; ^3.6.0 & quot ; , & quot ; redux-actions & quot ; : & quot ; ^1.2.1 & quot ; , & quot ; redux-thunk & quot ; : & quot ; ^2.2.0 & quot ; } , & quot ; devDependencies & quot ; : { & quot ; babel-jest & quot ; : & quot ; 18.0.0 & quot ; , & quot ; babel-preset-react-native & quot ; : & quot ; 1.9.1 & quot ; , & quot ; eslint & quot ; : & quot ; ^3.14.1 & quot ; , & quot ; eslint-config-airbnb & quot ; : & quot ; ^14.0.0 & quot ; , & quot ; eslint-plugin-import & quot ; : & quot ; ^2.2.0 & quot ; , & quot ; eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y & quot ; : & quot ; ^3.0.2 & quot ; , & quot ; eslint-plugin-react & quot ; : & quot ; ^6.9.0 & quot ; , & quot ; jest & quot ; : & quot ; 18.1.0 & quot ; , & quot ; react-test-renderer & quot ; : & quot ; 15.4.2 & quot ; } , & quot ; jest & quot ; : { & quot ; preset & quot ; : & quot ; react-native & quot ; } I searched issue someone say peer-dependency . Update , got detail google : Since app need background location , please request remove background usage reach compliance : If targeting Android 10 newer ( SDK level 29 higher ) : Remove ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION permission app APK app bundle . If ‚Äô using ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION , examine code path restrict usage foreground purpose . ( learn : http : //developer.android.com/training/location/background ) You longer see Location declaration listed console App Content . If targeting Android 9 older ( SDK level 28 lower ) : If ‚Äô already using ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION , examine code path restrict usage foreground purpose . ( learn : http : //developer.android.com/training/location/background ) In console declaration , select ‚Äú No ‚Äù question ‚Äú Does app access location background APKs app bundle targeting Android 9 older ?

Google Play say . Blockquote We 've detected app contains requestLegacyExternalStorage flag manifest file 1 app bundle APKs . Blockquote Developers apps device running Android 11+ must use Scoped Storage give user better access control device storage . To release app Android 11 newer May 5th , must either : Blockquote - Update app use privacy friendly best practice , Storage Access Framework Media Store API - Update app declare All file access ( MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE ) permission manifest file , complete All file access permission declaration Play Console May 5th - Remove All file access permission app entirely Blockquote For apps targeting Android 11 , requestLegacyExternalStorage flag ignored . Google Play store reject app due to non-certified ad SDK, React Native
When publishing app Google Play , encountered problem & quot ; Your app includes non-certified advertising SDKs ¬ª In short , mean advertising SDK meet requirement Google . Our application fall group & quot ; child & quot ; . We also participate & quot ; Apps Whole Family & quot ; program For advertising , use After checking list certified SDKs , found admob . That , everything fine point . Next , configured request receive ad , required Google . admob ( ) .setRequestConfiguration ( { maxAdContentRating : MaxAdContentRating.G , tagForChildDirectedTreatment : true , tagForUnderAgeOfConsent : true , } ) After resending application , received another failure reason . There attempt send app expo sdk bare react-native . This also failed produce result .
